mapper.select: SELECT member_seq ,count(*) as cnt ,DATE_FORMAT(reg_date,'%Y%m%d') as reg_date FROM accesscount WHERE member_seq = #{seq} AND DATE_FORMAT(reg_date,'%Y%m%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') GROUP BY count

SELECT a.member_seq ,IF(a.count is null,0,count(*)) as cnt ,DATE_FORMAT(b.yyyymmdd,'%Y-%m-%d') as reg_date FROM accesscount a RIGHT OUTER JOIN (select DATE_FORMAT(dt.yyyymmdd, '%Y%m%d') as yyyymmdd from ( select curdate() - INTERVAL (a.a + (10 * b.a) + (100 * c.a)) DAY as yyyymmdd ,a.a as aa ,b.a as ba ,c.a as ca from (select 0 as a union all select 1 union all select 2 union all select 3 union all select 4 union all select 5 union all select 6 union all select 7 union all select 8 union all select 9) as a cross join (select 0 as a union all select 1 union all select 2 union all select 3 union all select 4 union all select 5 union all select 6 union all select 7 union all select 8 union all select 9) as b cross join (select 0 as a union all select 1 union all select 2 union all select 3 union all select 4 union all select 5 union all select 6 union all select 7 union all select 8 union all select 9) as c ) dt where DATE_FORMAT(dt.yyyymmdd, '%Y%m%d') between DATE_FORMAT(date_add(now(),interval -6 day), '%Y%m%d') and now()) b ON DATE_FORMAT(a.reg_date,'%Y%m%d') = b.yyyymmdd AND a.member_seq = #{seq} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(b.yyyymmdd,'%Y%m%d') ORDER BY b.yyyymmdd ASC

SELECT a.member_seq ,count(*) as cnt ,DATE_FORMAT(a.reg_date,'%Y-%m-%d') FROM accesscount a WHERE DATE_FORMAT(a.reg_date,'%Y%m%d') = DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y%m%d') GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(a.reg_date,'%Y%m%d')
